channel.title: GNOME on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GNOME on Joone Blog

item.title: Glad to become a new GNOME foundation member
item.description: After I read this blog post, I applied for membership in the GNOME Foundation.

item.title: WebKitGtk+ Hackfest 2011
item.description: <img src="http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7032/6430000691_8da7528408.jpg" alt=""> (C) Mario Gustavo and I are attending the WebKitGtk+ hackfest 2011 which is held at the Igalia office in A Coruña, Spain like the last time.

item.title: Talking about GNOME3
item.description: I gave a talk about GNOME3 at Daum DevOn conference

item.title: Desktop Summit 2011
item.description: It has been a week since I got back home from Cambridge.

item.title: WebKitGtk+ Hackfest 2010
item.description: I attended the WebKitGtk+ Hackfest held in the Igalia Office, located in Coruña, Spain, in this month.
